alert.note: Alert for San Diego (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 24 at 9:26PM PST until February 26 at 8:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in San Diego CA has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in California... San Diego River At Fashion Valley affecting San Diego County. For the San Diego River...including Fashion Valley...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING TO SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...San Diego River At Fashion Valley. * WHEN...From Saturday evening to Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.3 feet, Flood stage. Minor flood. Low water crossings on the river in Mission Valley are closed and under water. Roads impacted include...Fashion Valley Road, Avenida Del Rio, Camino Del Este, Camino De La Reina, and Mission Center Road. Water flows into Fashion Valley parking lot. Fashion Valley transit center closed. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:49 PM PST Friday the stage was 3.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 11.3 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 11.3 feet. - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 930 AM PST.
